items.sentence: Mary removed the band from her ponytail and allowed her hair to fall loosely about her neck.
From the moment Mary became the boss, she made herself very unpopular with her subordinates.

Reading between the lines, it's clear that Tom isn't having such a good time in his new job.
Tom's car broke down on his way to Boston, so he had to spend a couple of nights in a motel.

One thing Tom does that isn\'t very safe is that he uses the same password for every website.
